name: Sakura Kanji Ketchi
description:
Sakura Kanji Ketchi is an innovative RPG that combines education and entertainment in a unique and engaging way. Set in Japan, you play as Sakura, a girl on a mission to find her missing father. Along the way, you'll encounter challenging obstacles that can only be overcome by learning Japanese kanji.

With Sakura Kanji Ketchi, you can learn Japanese kanji in a fun and pleasant way. Fight monsters, catch kanji, and craft new kanji as you progress through the game. The more kanji you catch and train, the more powerful you become in battle.

One of the most unique features of Sakura Kanji Ketchi is the ability to merge kanji to form new ones. This not only allows you to expand your vocabulary, but it also adds a new layer of strategy to the game.

Sakura Kanji Ketchi is perfect for people who want to learn Japanese kanji in a fun and enjoyable way. It's also a great tool for anyone preparing to take the JLPT (Japanese Language Proficiency Test).

So why wait? Join Sakura on her quest to find her father and learn Japanese kanji at the same time!
